ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2001_01_10: I’m bored. Come hang out with me, OK?
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
You look like you wanna hang out with me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Am I right?
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Missed me that much, huh? Fine, I’ll hang
out with you!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
Oh, you like it? Then I’ll bring some more
next time!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Be happy—I’ve got something for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
It’s a gift from me, so you’d better
be excited!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
You like stuff like this, right,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I know exactly what you’re into! You’re so
easy to read.
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
Use it wisely. And don’t forget to show some
gratitude, OK?
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2201_01_10: OK, what do you wanna talk about?
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
Let me guess—you want to chat with me
at the lodge, right?
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2203_01_10: Obviously we’ll have fun—it’s you and me!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
Oooh, finally learning some manners, huh?
You don’t have to twist my arm—I’ll use it.
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Really? For me? Huh, turns out you’ve
actually got good taste.
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
All right, that’s it for today! Let’s talk again
when we have time.
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Wow, you’re surprisingly good at holding a
conversation, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
You totally got me hooked! I had a great
time.
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
I came because you invited me, but this
place feels like the League Club’s room...
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
This place doesn’t have any rules about
seniority, though...right?
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
In that case, no need for me to act all
humble! I’ll just treat you like one of
my grunts!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
It seems festivals are always happening on
Pasio!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Hehehe... Maybe it wouldn’t be such a bad
idea to go to them all and become the
festival queen!
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
But if I’m not careful, I might spend all my
pocket money...
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Hey, tell me about where you were
born and raised.
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
As for me, I got this great personality by
growing up in a village full of kind people.
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
I was wondering if you were shaped by
your hometown, too.
ch0356_00_zeiyu_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
That said, no matter how great your
hometown, I bet it can’t beat Kitakami’s
charm!
